channel.title: How can i...?
channel.description:
how can i dl all files on a website??
this site: www.epicwar.com
host most maps ever made to wc3 and i wanna dl em. so how can i do that??
plz help

item.title: How can i...?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:7, topic:71869”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=105609.msg1062590#msg1062590 date=1175186517]

how do i set it up?

Download SCAR, open it, delete everything in the current window, place this into it and press play.

var
i : Integer;

begin
for i := 15000 to 16000 do
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.epicwar.com/maps/download/’ + IntToStr(i) + ‘/’);
end.

Be warned, it COULD lag you VERY badly.
[/quote]

Sexier than mine. I would add a wait in there as you will be opening 1000 downloads at one time lol[/quote]

Repeating openpage without a wait doesn’t open them instantly, it’s slow but if your using firefox/webbrowser with tabs and set the downloading file type to download automatically then all is good.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i...?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

not scar scripted in a while. I think this will work. Im at collage so I can’t even test.

Someone fix this up if its fuked please 

begin
const id:="730";
repeat
openpage("http://blah/15"+id)
wait(1000)
sendkeys(chr(13))
until(id=750)
end.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i...?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

All of the download can be initiated by accessing the address: http://www.epicwar.com/maps/download/#####, where ##### is a 1-5 digit number. You could easily enough write a script to grab each of the files…but I can’t imagine that there are any pre-existing scripts for this kind of specific downloading.

Read full topic
